text:
[cid:bb1a4624-628b-48a3-9817-6ab48ef7b262] 
Okay so I have 40% of a 750 MB, or 300 MB free.
Correct me if I am blind, but I see no documentation of how much free it needs
to be. Clearly 300 MB is not enough.
(Using Minitool) 
Okay so for a Sysadmin, is there a script/powershell tool to review partition
free sizes to see if someone will hit this ahead of time? Will normal inventory
tools document who does and who does not have recovery partitions?

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
